name: TetrEscape
description:
You're trapped, and the only way out is behind those blocks!  Slide tetrominos to clear a path to the exit and escape the room.  This new game from Inverted Productions fuses sliding block puzzles with the classic block-based line-clearing game for a brand new challenge.

Play in your browser, or download the paid version to play without ads.
If you experience issues playing in your browser, you may need to disable your adblocker.
